title: Identity this font?
content:
Can someone tell me what base font this is?

| --- | --- |
| [coffee-logo-designs-(1).jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017063346/http:/typophile.com/files/coffee-logo-designs-(1).jpg) | 42.78 KB |
author: karent0510

comments.content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017063346im_/http:/typophile.com/files/369114762_640_6115.jpg)

Could someone identify this one also? And does anyone recommend any fonts to use for a french patisserie/cafe logo?
Coffee looks like [Semilla](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017063346/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/semilla/regular/) with alternate glyphs.
